subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Before the Jets face the Giants on Friday, Walls, a cornerback, plans to continue his custom of kneeling in one end zone and praying for four people dear to him who have died in the last 17 months.
snippet: Before the Jets face the Giants on Friday, Walls, a cornerback, plans to continue his custom of kneeling in one end zone and praying for four people dear to him who have died in the last 17 months.
